languages.text: "Долгие годы хранили мы верность Домини династии. Священные символы и реликвии собирали. Ты — перв{mf|ый|ая} из царей и цариц, что за три поколения в смерти святилище снизош{mf|ел|ла}. И перв{mf|ый|ая}, кого мы в культ посвящаем. Мы благодарны. Мы счастливы. Услышь ликование — и одеяние, сшитое нитями смерти из кости верных Ему, в дар прими".

traits.locale_text: "Долгие годы хранили мы верность Домини династии. Священные символы и реликвии собирали. Ты — перв{mf|ый|ая} из царей и цариц, что за три поколения в смерти святилище снизош{mf|ел|ла}. И перв{mf|ый|ая}, кого мы в в культ посвящаем. Мы благодарны. Мы счастливы. Услышь ликование — и одеяние, сшитое нитями смерти из кости верных Ему, в дар прими".

languages.text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to grace this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."
languages.original_text: "Долгие годы хранили мы верность Домини династии. Священные символы и реликвии собирали. Ты — перв{mf|ый|ая} из царей и цариц, что за три поколения в смерти святилище снизош{mf|ел|ла}. И перв{mf|ый|ая}, кого мы в культ посвящаем. Мы благодарны. Мы счастливы. Услышь ликование — и одеяние, сшитое нитями смерти из кости верных Ему, в дар прими".

traits.locale_text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to descend into this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."

languages.text: « Depuis de longues années, nous servons fidèlement les Domini, amassant lentement mais sûrement les symboles et reliques sacrés. Vous êtes {mf|le premier|la première} en trois générations de libres-marchands à gratifier ce sanctum de votre présence. Et {mf|le seul|la seule} à être {mf|initié|initiée} de la sorte. Nous en sommes reconnaissants, et notre foi s'en trouve redoublée. Entendez notre exultation et acceptez ce modeste présent, un habit sacerdotal taillé dans les ossements de Ses fidèles, cousus ensemble par les fils de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to grace this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis de longues années, nous servons fidèlement les Domini, amassant lentement mais sûrement les symboles et reliques sacrés. Vous êtes {mf|le premier|la première} en trois générations de libres-marchands à gratifier ce sanctum de votre présence. Et {mf|le seul|la seule} à être {mf|initié|initiée} de la sorte. Nous en sommes reconnaissants, et notre foi s'en trouve redoublée. Entendez notre exultation et acceptez ce modeste présent, un habit sacerdotal taillé dans les ossements de Ses fidèles, cousus ensemble par les fils de la mort. »

languages.text: «Durante años, hemos sido leales a los Domini. Hemos reunido símbolos y reliquias sagrados. Es {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en tres generaciones de capitanes en descender a este santuario. Se lo agradecemos. Es un honor. Escuche nuestro júbilo y acepte este regalo: unas vestiduras tejidas con los huesos de Sus fieles y los hilos de la muerte».
languages.original_text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to grace this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."

traits.locale_text: «Durante años, hemos sido leales a los Domini. Hemos reunido símbolos y reliquias sagrados. Es {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en tres generaciones de capitanes en descender a este santuario. Se lo agradecemos. Es un honor. Escuche nuestro júbilo y acepte este regalo: unas vestiduras tejidas con los huesos de Sus fieles y los hilos de la muerte».

languages.text: 「何年もの間、我らは王朝のドミニに忠誠を誓ってきた。我らは神聖なシンボルや聖遺物を集めてきた。このサンクトゥムに降りてきたのは、三代にわたる諸侯においてあなたが初めてなのだ。そして、このようにして儀式を受けた最初の方でもある。ありがたいことだ。我らの喜びを聞き届け、主に忠実な者たちの骨を死の糸で縫い合わせたこの法衣の贈り物を受け取ってくだされ」
languages.original_text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to grace this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."

traits.locale_text: 「何年もの間、我らは王朝のドミニに忠誠を誓ってきた。我らは神聖なシンボルや聖遺物を集めてきた。このサンクトゥムに降りてきたのは、三代にわたる諸侯においてあなたが初めてなのだ。そして、このようにして儀式を受けた最初の方でもある。ありがたいことだ。我らの喜びを聞き届け、主に忠実な者たちの骨を死の糸で縫い合わせたこの法衣の贈り物を受け取ってくだされ」

languages.text: “无数年来，我们一直效忠于诸位秘者，收集了许多神圣的遗物。在最近三代的秘者之中，您是第一位亲临这座圣殿的秘者，也是第一位接受教义的秘者。我们对您充满感激，我们的心灵无比振奋。请聆听我们的喜悦，接受这件用祂忠仆的骨头与死亡之线缝制而成的圣衣。”
languages.original_text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to grace this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."

traits.locale_text: “无数年来，我们一直效忠于诸位秘者，收集了许多神圣的遗物。在最近三代的秘者之中，您是第一位亲临这座圣殿的秘者，也是第一位接受教义的秘者。我们对您充满感激，我们的心灵无比振奋。请聆听我们的喜悦，接受这件用祂忠仆的骨头与死亡之线缝制而成的圣衣。”

languages.text: "Wir dienen seit Jahren den Domini. Wir haben heilige Symbole und Relikte gesammelt. Ihr seid in drei Generationen von Lords und Ladys {mf|der Erste, der|die Erste, die} dieses Heiligtum ziert. Und {mf|der Erste, der|die Erste, die} eingeweiht wird. Wir sind dankbar. Das hebt unsere Stimmung. Hört unser Loblied und nehmt dieses Geschenk an, ein Gewand genäht aus den Knochen seiner Gläubigen, mit den Fäden des Todes."
languages.original_text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to grace this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."

traits.locale_text: "Wir dienen seit Jahren den Domini. Wir haben heilige Symbole und Relikte gesammelt. Ihr seid in drei Generationen von Lords und Ladys {mf|der Erste, der|die Erste, die} dieses Heiligtum ziert. Und {mf|der Erste, der|die Erste, die} eingeweiht wird. Wir sind dankbar. Das hebt unsere Stimmung. Hört unser Loblied und nehmt dieses Geschenk an, ein Gewand genäht aus den Knochen seiner Gläubigen, mit den Fäden des Todes."

languages.text: "Yıllar boyunca Dominlere sadakatimizi koruduk. Kutsal semboller ve yadigârlar topladık. Üç kuşak boyunca tüm o lordlar ve leydiler arasından bu kutağa onur veren inen siz oldunuz, bugüne kadar aramıza ilk siz katıldınız. Minnettarız ve moralimiz son derece yerinde. Sevincimizi dinleyin ve O'nun inançlılarının kemiklerinden ölümün iplikleriyle dokunmuş bu cübbeyi hediye olarak kabul edin."
languages.original_text: "For years, we have maintained fealty to the Domini. We have collected sacred symbols and relics. You are the first in three generations of lords and ladies to grace this sanctum. And the first of them all to be initiated so. We are grateful. We are uplifted in spirit. Hear our exultation and accept this gift of a vestment sewn from the bones of His faithful with the threads of death."
